text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Four times a year, special<n>competitions known as tryouts
are<n>held at Tracen Academy. Here,<n>trainers gauge the
potential of talented<n>students.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
All are welcome as spectators,<n>whether they are an
academy student<n>or a racing fan. This time, all of the<n>
trainers' eyes are on one runner in<n>particular.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
To reach the upper echelons of the<n>Twinkle Series and to
achieve a<n>first-place victory in the Tenno<n>Sho—these are
my goals as a Mejiro.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I'll show you all exactly what I'm<n>capable of during this
tryout race!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
The Mejiro family is rich with a<n>history of top-class runners,
and I<n>hear that McQueen is their most<n>promising
up-and-comer. I'm lookin'<n>forward to this.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Even before entering the Academy,<n>she's made a name for
herself as a<n>talented stayer. I'm eager to see just<n>how
far she's honed her skills!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her flowing hair a striking ashen hue,<n>Mejiro McQueen has
captured the<n>attention of many.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Hey, McQueen! Our group's up next.<n>Let's get over to the
gates!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ah, yes! Thank you, Ines Fujin.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Let's make haste!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro McQueen's tryout race is<n>under way, and things
aren't looking<n>good for her.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The runners are fast approaching the<n>finish line, but Mejiro
McQueen<n>lingers at the rear!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Geh!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: She can't seem to catch up... Has she<n>run out of steam?

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, she's not quite matching her<n>reputation as a stayer,
but maybe we<n>were expecting too much.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Wheeze, wheeze...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: She's giving it her all, but she can't<n>catch up!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Ines Fujin leads the pack... and<n>crosses the finish line!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Ines Fujin has won the tryout race!<n>The shouts heard
echoing across the<n>track are sure to follow her for years<n>
to come!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Hehe, thanks,everyone! Your cheers are whatcarried me to first place!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
A good pair of legs on her, that Ines<n>Fujin. I bet that she
could be an<n>absolute beast given the right training<n>
regimen.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Right. I'd love to have her on our<n>team!

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Today's supposed star, though... She<n>didn't quite hit the
strides I thought<n>she would.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Tch... How shameful!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With Mejiro McQueen placing<n>seventh, Ines Fujin
completely steals<n>the spotlight.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: However...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Deciding to visit the training course<n>once more, I spot
Mejiro McQueen<n>running down the track.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: No... I can do much better than that!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Hey, thought I spotted you—McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh, Ryan. Did you need<n>something of me?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: No, not really. I just saw you running<n>from over there...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
McQueen, you've got moxie, but<n>don't you think you're
overdoing it a<n>bit? That tryout race must have you<n>beat...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I appreciate the concern, but I'm<n>going to keep going for a
little longer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: McQueen, you...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
My rivals in today's tryout race were<n>of much higher caliber
than I<n>anticipated.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I shouldn't have underestimatedanyone. I knew that TracenAcademy is full of talentedindividuals.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
But I can still recover. I'll show<n>everyone what I am capable
of at the<n>next tryout race!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I wouldn't be able to call myself a<n>Mejiro otherwise.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A flame flickers within her eyes as<n>she proclaims her
intentions to<n>succeed.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
Oh? Well, if it isn't the new trainer<n>everyone has been
talking about!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
Were any of the students on your<n>mind after today's tryout
races?
choice_data_list: Yeah, I'm interested in Mejiro McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I decide then and there to pay Mejiro<n>McQueen a visit on
the following day.
